summary.p: Gets a substring from a specified string.

syntax.code: SUBSTRING(text AS string, start AS int) RETURNS string SUBSTRING(text AS string, start AS int, length AS int) RETURNS string

param.name: text
param.p: A string from which to retreive a substring.

param.name: start
param.p: The position of the start of the substring.

param.name: length
param.p: The number of characters in the substring.

returns.p: A string equivalent to the substring of length length that begins at start in text, or '' if start is greater than the length of text.
